org.jetel.util.string

Class CharSequenceReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • org.jetel.util.string.CharSequenceReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class CharSequenceReader
extends java.io.Reader
    This class implements Reader interface on top of CharSequence - i.e. it enables reading chars from String,StringBuffer/Builder,CharBuffer
    Since:
    Oct 24, 2007
